docs.summary: Fast forward only INI parser class.

remarks.para: An INI is a file is a simple file format for storing configuration information. These files are line based. Each line can be one of three types: empty, section, or key/value pair. All of these formats allow for comments. Comments are delimited by hash mark ('#') or a semi-colon (';').
